introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text: At Ethio Telecom ("we", "us", "our"), your privacy matters. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use the NameTAG service and related platforms.

personalInformation.label: Personal Information:
personalInformation.text: Any information that identifies, relates to, or can be used to identify an individual.

service.label: Service:
service.text: The NameTAG virtual number service, including associated websites, apps, and platforms.

personalInformation.label: Personal Information:
personalInformation.text: Such as your name, email address, mobile number, and other identifiers provided during registration.

usageData.label: Usage Data:
usageData.text: Information on how you interact with the Service, including browsing history, search queries, and communication patterns.

deviceInformation.label: Device Information:
deviceInformation.text: Details like your IP address, device type, operating system, and browser type.

directly.label: Directly from you:
directly.text: When you register, contact support, or interact with the Service.

automatically.label: Automatically:
automatically.text: Using cookies and tracking technologies as you use our Service.

thirdParties.label: From third parties:
thirdParties.text: Including our partners, affiliates, social media and publicly available sources.

items.provide: Provide, operate, and maintain the NameTAG Service.
items.improve: Improve and personalize your user experience.
items.communicate: Communicate important information, updates, and promotional offers (with your consent).

disclosure.heading: Disclosure of Information
disclosure.intro: We may share your Personal Information with:

serviceProviders.label: Service Providers:
serviceProviders.text: Who assist in delivering and improving our services.

partners.label: Partners and Affiliates:
partners.text: For service expansion and customer support.

lawEnforcement.label: Law Enforcement or Regulatory Authorities:
lawEnforcement.text: When required to comply with legal obligations or protect rights and safety.

cookies.heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:

items.analyze: Analyze and understand how our Service is used.

cookies.note: You can manage your cookie preferences through your device or browser settings.

items.access: Access and review your Personal Information.
items.object: Object to the processing of your information in certain circumstances.
items.requestDeletion: Request deletion of your Personal Information (subject to legal obligations).
items.optOut: Opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time.

security.heading: Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your Personal Information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

dataRetention.heading: Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We retain your Personal Information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

changes.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on our website, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

acceptance.heading: Acceptance of the Privacy Policy
acceptance.text: By using the NameTAG Service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
